title: Pitta bread salad with cucumber, feta and mint
ingredients: ['2 pitta breads, diced', '60ml extra virgin olive oil', '3 tablespoons white wine vinegar', 'coarse sea salt', '500g fresh spinach or other salad leaves', '3 sticks celery, diced', '1 cucumber, peeled, seeds removed and diced small', '1 bunch fresh mint, cut into thin strips', '1 handful watercress', '175g feta, crumbled', 'ground black pepper']
